articles.author: Andy Kiersz
articles.title: The under-the-radar risk that could sink America's economy - Business Insider
articles.description: The quality and availability of economic data is declining. That could end up with a lot of unemployed Americans and increase the chance of recession.
articles.content: One of the most underrated revolutions of the past 50 years is the explosion of easily accessible data. Whether it's detailed breakdowns of the characteristics of every neighborhood in the US, improv… [+12856 chars]
